translation.Message_0_Page_0: The dead drops are easy to use - just simply go there and drop in items.  To make moving things easier, you can only dead drop certain items: Weapons, Clothing, Books, and material supplies.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: These will be moved to survivors, and you'll be paid directly by the operator there.  But, watch out for other people out there who might try to attack you.  Keep that in mind!
